definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: Codium is the favourite food of some sea slugs.
sentences.chinese: 松藻是一些海蔘的美食。

sentences.english: Juan Guarda Tempranillo is excellent with meat, cheese and Italian dishes.
sentences.chinese: 最適合佐餐肉類，奶酪和意大利美食。

sentences.english: Organize your friends to hold a food festival.
sentences.chinese: 組織你的朋友們舉辦一次美食節。

sentences.english: Secondly， I would like to try the local delicacies of Xi’an.
sentences.chinese: 其次，我希望品嚐一下西安的地方美食。

sentences.english: The cuisine of Singapore can indicate the ethnic diversity of the culture of Singa­pore.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡的美食展現了新加坡文化中的種族多樣性。

sentences.english: Think back to the gastronomic example.
sentences.chinese: 回過頭再來想想關於美食的例子。

sentences.english: However, a series of food safety incidents has damaged the country's reputation for fine cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 然而，一系列食品安全事件卻令中華美食名聲受損。

sentences.english: State-of-the-art fine dining and all-day dining restaurant overlook the skylobby and pool.
sentences.chinese: 藝術和美食餐廳一應而全，俯瞰着空中大堂和泳池。

sentences.english: Rich knowledge about food and drinks.
sentences.chinese: 對美食和餐酒有豐富的應知。

sentences.english: So far, Ciba is still the South before the Spring Festival every year people around the food must be done.
sentences.chinese: 至今，餈粑仍是南方各地人民每年春節前必做的美食。

sentences.english: There’s nothing fancy here but there is really good food that is very reasonably priced.
sentences.chinese: 這裏無什麼獨到之處，但確實是有標價便宜的美食呢。

sentences.english: No matter where I go, Yangzhou's snacks will never leave my mind.
sentences.chinese: 無論我走到哪裏，我都會想起揚州的美食。

sentences.english: May I invite you to our food festival?
sentences.chinese: 我可以邀請你參加我們的美食節活動嗎？

sentences.english: The most famous Food Street of Lijiang is located in Square Street side.
sentences.chinese: 麗江著名的美食街坐落在四方街旁邊。

sentences.english: Air France passengers are treated to a delectable spread and smiling service.
sentences.chinese: 法航的旅客享用機上美食，並和空姐微笑交談。

sentences.english: The delicious food of all over the world there also lets tourists get their eyes wide open.
sentences.chinese: 中外美食更是令人大開眼界，拍手叫絕。

definition: to be fond of eating/to be gluttonous
to smell, look and taste great
to eat one's fill/to have a good meal
